title: (Transfer of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Cultural Institutions Act 1997
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Cultural Institutions Act 1997 

(Amendment of First Schedule) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national cultural institution act 1997 (amendment first schedule) order 2020

title: (Transfer of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order
heading: 2. The First Schedule to the National Cultural Institutions Act 1997 (No.
text_raw:
2. The First Schedule to the National Cultural Institutions Act 1997 (No. 

11 of 1997) is amended - 

(a) 

in column (2), opposite the mention of the Board of the National 
Library of Ireland in column (1), by the insertion of the 
following premises: 

“That part of the premises known as Iron Mountain (Ireland) 
Services Limited, Damastown Rise, Damastown Industrial 
Estate, Dublin 15, D15 R250, occupied by the National Library 
of Ireland. 

That part of the premises known as Glenbeigh Records 
Management Limited, Damastown Way, Damastown Business 
Park, Dublin 15, D15 X9DP, occupied by the National Library 
of Ireland.”, 

and 

(b) 

in column (2), opposite the mention of the Board of the National 
Museum of Ireland in column (1), by the insertion of the 
following premises: 

“The premises known as Collections Resource Centre, Swords, 
County Dublin, occupied by the National Museum of Ireland.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

[758] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 

9 December, 2020. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, 

21 December, 2020. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [758]
